publications.title: Remote Dataset: Efficient Transformers for 3D Vision
publications.authors: Feiyang Ma, Remote Collaborator X, Remote Collaborator Y
publications.description: Remote dataset: Novel transformer architecture optimized for 3D point cloud processing with linear complexity and state-of-the-art performance on semantic segmentation tasks.

publications.title: Remote Dataset: Learning Spatial Representations from Video
publications.description: Remote dataset: Self-supervised approach for learning 3D spatial representations from monocular video sequences using temporal consistency constraints.

publications.title: Remote Dataset: Foundation Models for Robotics
publications.authors: Feiyang Ma, Remote Team A, Remote Team B, Remote Team C
publications.description: Remote dataset: Large-scale foundation model trained on diverse robotic manipulation tasks, enabling zero-shot transfer to new environments and objects.

publications.title: Remote Dataset: Neural Radiance Fields at Scale
publications.description: Remote dataset: Scalable neural radiance field approach for city-scale 3D reconstruction from aerial imagery with photorealistic novel view synthesis.
